dict.acceptation: 级别最高的；总的；主要的；最重要的；
族长；酋长；首领；主管人员；

sent.orig: The chief of the United States, serving as both chief of state and chief political executive.
sent.trans: 在美国，总统是国家元首民时也是政府首脑。

sent.orig: Chief tallyman, what's the pilot time? The chief requires to start the engine one hour earlier.
sent.trans: 理货组长，什么时候开航？大副要求在开航前一小时发动引擎。

sent.orig: Be aware of the time schedule of the chief manager, and provide appointment service chief manager.
sent.trans: 针对客户具体状况，协助部门主管提出管理咨询方案，提供管理咨询服务。

sent.orig: Chief Justice Roberts does not mark a big shift from Chief Justice Rehnquist, to be sure.
sent.trans: 当然，首席大法官罗伯茨与前大法官伦奎斯特(Rehnquist)之间并不存在巨大的立场转变。

sent.orig: Report any urgent matters or irregularities to the Chief Engineer or Assistant Chief Engineer immediately.
sent.trans: 及时迅速的向总工程师和副总工程师报告紧急或异常情况。
